rules_text:
Whenever Overeager Researcher deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.
Ploy – Creatures you control can't be blocked by creatures with greater power this turn. [i](When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I can't believe my luck! The Multiverse is real, and I get to explore it!”[/i]
